meanings: (옷을) (동작) put on, dress, get dressed; (걸치다) slip on; (급히) throw on; (상태) wear, have (sth) on, be dressed in
(도움·은혜 등을) be indebted to, get[receive] a favor, be favored (with)

vlive.korean: 이거 거의 몇 년 만에 입은 것 같은데? I think it's been a few years since I wore this. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [GOT7] 왜요..? 제가 재채기도 말랑깜찍하게 하는 김유겸 팬처럼 생겼나요..? (YUGYEOM answering fans’ questions)
vlive.english: I think it's been a few years since I wore this.

vlive.korean: 저희가 입은 거예요 - 저희가 이걸 입게 된 이유가 뭔 줄 알아요? We wore these. - Do you know why we dress like this? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) : SKZ-TALKER(슼즈토커)] Ep.27
vlive.english: We wore these. - Do you know why we dress like this?

vlive.korean: 그럼 둘 중에는 라이더 재킷을 입은 친구가 조금 더 편했겠네요 연기하기? Acting out the one with the rider jacket must've been more comfortable, right? 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : [full] WOODZ 1ST MINI ALBUM [EQUAL] SHOWCASE
vlive.english: Acting out the one with the rider jacket must've been more comfortable, right?

vlive.korean: [오늘 소원 이룬 우리즈원] 맞아요 테니스복 입은 건 처음이지 않았어요 저희? [IZ*ONE's dreams came true today] Right. Isn't it the first time we wore tennis clothes? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [DICON] 앙즈뽀짝 폴라로이드 꾸미기③ (IZ*ONE)
vlive.english: [IZ*ONE's dreams came true today] Right. Isn't it the first time we wore tennis clothes?

vlive.korean: [소복 입은 귀...신?] [Ghost with mourning clothes?] View video Hyomstore : ep.17 횸스토어 MD들의 숨겨진 능력 대방출!

examples.korean: expensively dressed / furnished 발음듣기 비싼 옷을 입은/가구를 들여 놓은 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
cardinals in scarlet robes 발음듣기 진홍색 대례복을 입은 추기경들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
dressed in sombre shades of grey and black 발음듣기 칙칙한 색조의 회색과 검정색 옷을 입은 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: dressed in sombre shades of grey and black 발음

examples.korean: drab women, dressed in browns and greys 발음듣기 갈색과 회색 옷을 입은 생기 없는 여자들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: drab women, dressed in browns and greys 발음

examples.korean: She jumped fully clothed into the water. 발음듣기 그녀는 옷을 다 입은 채 물 속으로 뛰어들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She jumped fully clothed into the water. 발음
